definitions.text: something intended to communicate a particular impression
examples: a good show of looking interested
the museum had many exhibits of oriental art

definitions.text: behavior that makes your feelings public
an electronic device that represents information in visual form
to show, make visible or apparent
examples: The Metropolitan Museum is exhibiting Goya's works this month
Why don't you show your nice legs and wear shorter skirts?
National leaders will have to display the highest skills of statesmanship

definitions.text: attract attention by displaying some body part or posing; of animals
